snippet.title: From Light - Fig Trailer
snippet.description:
You can back us here: http://fig.co/from-light
Join our Thunderclap: http://bit.ly/thunderclapFromLight

Please back the campaign, share it with your friends and on social media, and comment! Every little thing helps!

From Light is a 2D puzzle platformer in the same vein as The Swapper, Braid, and Fez, creating a new take on the genre with innovative photography inspired mechanics. Use your camera to light-paint your own platforms, freeze objects in place and solve challenging free form puzzles, in search of your missing friend.
